data.title: Saskatoon bishop urges caution with COVID-19 vaccine mandates
data.description: Saskatoon's most senior Catholic leader says while he's supportive of public health measures, he's concerned COVID-19 vaccine mandates could veer into "ethically questionable" territory.

data.title: Police searching for inmate who escaped Sask. healing lodge
data.description: Police are looking for a man who escaped from a federal correctional facility west of Duck Lake

data.title: Sask. First Nation holds Vaxx Fest to boost vaccination rates
data.description: Onion Lake Cree Nation is hosting an event called Vaxx Fest to raise vaccination rates.

data.title: Sask. reports death of COVID-19 patient transferred to Ont.
data.description: The Saskatchewan government confirmed 141 new cases of COVID-19 on Friday, along with the death of a COVID-19 patient who was transferred to Ontario.

data.title: Saskatoon lawyer makes jump to FSIN to advocate for Indigenous people
data.description: Aly Bear aims to use her legal knowledge to advocate for Indigenous people on a bigger platform after being elected third vice-chief of the Federation of Sovereign Indigenous Nations.

data.title: 'Lifetime of dishonest acts': Final arguments heard in Saskatoon forcible confinement, sexual assault trial
data.description: Closing arguments were heard in the trial of Joseph Yaremko, who is charged with sexual assault with a weapon and forcible confinement.

data.title: Sask. mayors raise concerns about provincial income support program
data.description: Saskatchewan city mayors say theyâ€™re concerned about challenges faced by people on the new Saskatchewan Income Support (SIS) program.

data.title: Humboldt Broncos trademark name and logo
data.description: The Humboldt Broncos hockey club trademarked its name and logo.

data.title: 2 dead in dramatic shootout near upscale Mexican resorts
data.description: A commando of drug gang gunmen on Thursday stormed ashore at a beach on Mexico's resort-studded Caribbean coast in front of luxury hotels and executed two drug dealers from a rival gang.

data.title: Saskatoon Hindu community shows support for victims in Bangladesh
data.description: Dozens from the Saskatoon Hindu community gathered at City Hall to show support for people affected by recent attacks in Bangladesh.
